website_summaries.verdict: Adding to the basketball-inspired roster of Reebok, the BB 4600 is a great iteration of the 1986 release. Retaining most of its authentic silhouette, this modified high-cut sneaker offers the same familiar comfort, support, and stability of the earliest version.Having the OG color variation available makes the shoe hunters feel like they had purchased or repurchased a pair from when it was first launched, along with the sentimental memories attached to it.
pros: The majority of the wearers emphasize that the Reebok BB 4600 is a silhouette that transcends time and style
Fans of Reebok shoes highlight that the comfort level on this shoe is superb
Several users describe that the leather on this retro model feels softer than the original version
Numerous collectors of sneakers share that the near-OG resemblance is nostalgic from when they were rocking this trainer in the 80s
Most of the customers emphasize that the retro design gives it an overall authentic vintage vibe
A few individuals declare that this basketball-inspired kick provides excellent support to the foot and ankle
The price comes at a very reasonable rate, considering the timelessness it affords the wearer, quips a handful of purchasers
cons: Quite a handful of reviewers express their disappointment that the ankle collar is not as hi-top as the OG
Some testers exclaim that the forefoot feels too narrow even for narrow-footed users
A couple of users mention that they wish there were more color variations to choose from

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are narrow shoes in the instep.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes! But they were to narrow. I had to go up a size and a half and they were still too tight and narrow.
customer_reviews.author: TL Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Got the icecream Alva version. Nice enough as is but came in the actual icecream box with the collectable spoon(ehh) and atleast 5 pairs of extra laces. Check out feature's website and get a matching icecream Alva jacket
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: It is worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and the style is amazing. I’m definitely buying another one—soon. Isn’t cheap but isn’t expensive either. I wear Levi’s with the Reebok—single fold right on top of the Reebok’s gives it the opportunity to shine. Guys, you’ll love this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Albert D.

customer_reviews.title: Order a size half bigger
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, just fits a half size small Overall great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color shoes
customer_reviews.text: They came in the wrong color they were supposed to be just like the picture you have and it's a very good product I wear for work
customer_reviews.author: brad vieau

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Always love Icecreams and they should bring back the OG ones they would sell out fast
customer_reviews.author: Rye

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: solid comfortable ankle support sneaker. looks good for winter wear.
customer_reviews.author: woody girl.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Brand
customer_reviews.text: see these ice cubes see these ice cream love them BBC IceCream
customer_reviews.author: keandre manora

customer_reviews.title: Deserves more than 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I work full time at discount tire and it's hard to find cheap shoes that are comfortable. These not only match my black and red uniform providing me with drip but I can wear them my entire 10 to 11 hour shifts with no feet paid. And for the 1st time EVER I haven't even put the Dr scholl's pad in them. They're comfortable just the way they are. Most definitely buying 5 more pairs of these before I never see them again (and mainly because working out back on tires can ruin shoes really quick)
customer_reviews.author: Josh G

customer_reviews.title: Great service from Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: Reebok basketball shoes have always been a favorite of mine. These were no exception. Very comfortable daily show.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love these Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Had to reorder due to never receiving it the first time, but sure glad I did! They fit perfectly, and the primal red, or whatever kind of red, looks awesome with the all black! Plus, you can't beat the price. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Cire Z.

product_meta.title: Reebok unisex-adult JAD47 Bb 4600
feature_bullets: Leather upper for a glove-like fit
Mid-cut build for extra support of ankles and improved foot stability
EVA midsole insert for lightweight comfort
Rubber outsole for traction and durability
